problem: A simple folding newspaper or tabloid can be made by folding a piece of paper vertically and unfolding. Then, say, page 1 is printed on the left back, page 2 is printed on the left front, and then, perhaps page 6235671 is printed on the right back, and page 31 is printed on the right front. How many pieces of paper would be used in a 6235671-page tabloid?
